content: quote: Originally posted by fmfdoc451: There is also a Volcano (currently innactive)in the South Pacific, that is showing signs of coming to life..... it's a growing volcanic island which is closely situated to a large volcano which blew in the early-mid 1800's. Crakatou (sp), I think. There was a good special on the History channel a couple of weeks ago....... Ring of Fire, indeed!! The whole Pacific Rim is all connected! It's called Anak Krakatau <son of krakatau>. It's actually the same volcano that has been building another dome since the last eruption. They say it could blow again. The reason Krakatau was such a poweful blast was because the magma chamber collapsed and seawater flashed over to steam in a huge blast. The same thing is shaping up this time around. content: Nope - if you notice, Utah is moving away from the Yellowstone hotspot, not towards it. the hotspot (like under Hawaii) is like a blow torch pointed upward under the surface, occasionally popping a hole through the mantle, like a cutting torch. If Yellowstone explodes again, the lava and ash will spew along the lines of prevailing winds and cover Wyoming, South Dakota, Nebraska, etc all the way to New York.... Utah might get the Earthquake - but all the ash should go straight east.... Now, if the Russians or Chinese nuke California, we're in big trouble!! Wandering and Wondering
reply: Nope - if you notice, Utah is moving away from the Yellowstone hotspot, not towards it. the hotspot (like under Hawaii) is like a blow torch pointed upward under the surface, occasionally popping a hole through the mantle, like a cutting torch. content: Nope - if you notice, Utah is moving away from the Yellowstone hotspot, not towards it. the hotspot (like under Hawaii) is like a blow torch pointed upward under the surface, occasionally popping a hole through the mantle, like a cutting torch. If Yellowstone explodes again, the lava and ash will spew along the lines of prevailing winds and cover Wyoming, South Dakota, Nebraska, etc all the way to New York.... Utah might get the Earthquake - but all the ash should go straight east.... Now, if the Russians or Chinese nuke California, we're in big trouble!! Wandering and Wondering
reply: Nope - if you notice, Utah is moving away from the Yellowstone hotspot, not towards it. the hotspot (like under Hawaii) is like a blow torch pointed upward under the surface, occasionally popping a hole through the mantle, like a cutting torch. content: There is also a Volcano (currently innactive)in the South Pacific, that is showing signs of coming to life..... it's a growing volcanic island which is closely situated to a large volcano which blew in the early-mid 1800's. Crakatou (sp), I think. There was a good special on the History channel a couple of weeks ago....... Ring of Fire, indeed!! The whole Pacific Rim is all connected!

title: "Ring of Fire" Firing Up!

content: quote: Originally posted by fmfdoc451: There is also a Volcano (currently innactive)in the South Pacific, that is showing signs of coming to life..... it's a growing volcanic island which is closely situated to a large volcano which blew in the early-mid 1800's. Crakatou (sp), I think. There was a good special on the History channel a couple of weeks ago....... Ring of Fire, indeed!! The whole Pacific Rim is all connected! It's called Anak Krakatau <son of krakatau>. It's actually the same volcano that has been building another dome since the last eruption. They say it could blow again. The reason Krakatau was such a poweful blast was because the magma chamber collapsed and seawater flashed over to steam in a huge blast. The same thing is shaping up this time around. "Thank you, for your support." - Bartles & Jaymes

content: Nope - if you notice, Utah is moving away from the Yellowstone hotspot, not towards it. the hotspot (like under Hawaii) is like a blow torch pointed upward under the surface, occasionally popping a hole through the mantle, like a cutting torch. If Yellowstone explodes again, the lava and ash will spew along the lines of prevailing winds and cover Wyoming, South Dakota, Nebraska, etc all the way to New York.... Utah might get the Earthquake - but all the ash should go straight east.... Now, if the Russians or Chinese nuke California, we're in big trouble!! Wandering and Wondering
